review: A great way to share what is on your computer / iPad onto your television.  Was very easy to setup, and seems to work nicely.  Audio is via TV and seems like there are quite a few web sites that recognize this and make it easy to watch things on the big screen.Very nice add-on !
author: Rich-Ridgewood,NJ

review: nice product but it cannot mirror your phone screen to the TV. So i give 4 stars :)
author: Good.

review: I love everything Google, but this is completely useless for me since I already have a PC connected to my 50 inch flat screen...
author: Nestor Wright

review: Lots of potential, cant wait to see what it's like in 2 years!

review: Piece of crap.  more google junk,

review: Easy to install and very easy to operate.
